COMMENT_TX: Debut for umpires Ed Murray and Gus Klein, who worked because the staff umpires were not working due to contract negotiations which stalled during spring training; the contract was settled but the assigned umpires could not get to Kansas City in time to work the game; former AL umpire Dallas Parks worked at 2B
Debut game for David Howard

umpchange,2,ump2b,(None) rain delay $2B umpire Al Clark suffered back spams and did not return after the rain delay

Debut game for Jim Hunter

$on the infield fly, 3B Edgar Martinez did not catch the ball and both Kirk Gibson and Brian McRae left their bases; McRae was called out for passing Gibson
Junior Ortiz left with a twisted ankle
